task: Locate a recipe for an American apple pie on Allrecipes with a rating of at least 4 stars and more than 50 reviews. Note the maximum temperature mentioned in the Directions.
Locate a recipe for an American apple pie on Allrecipes with a rating of at least 4 stars and more than 50 reviews. Note the maximum temperature mentioned in the Directions.
user_action: type "American apple pie" into the search bar with the placeholder 'Find a recipe or ingredient' and press enter to search for recipes.
observation: The search results show several options for American apple pie recipes. The 'All American Apple Pie' recipe has 613 ratings with a high rating, and the 'Apple Pie by Grandma Ople' has 12,824 ratings, also with a high rating. Both meet the criteria of having more than 50 reviews and a rating of at least 4 stars. The next step should be to click on one of these recipes to check the directions for the maximum baking temperature.
